name: Gears-n-keys
description:
Made by: Linus Andersson.

You will be loaded into the inside of a chain of spinning gears.
Your goal: to reach the yellow room, the end of the chain.
Obstacles: The continually spinning map and a number of locked doors.
Mission: Collect the colored keys scattered across the map to unlock the doors of the same color within each colored room.

Known bugs yet to be fixed:
The majorty of the walls within the game have no hitbox. Please treat walls and locked doors as objects that you can't pass through for now.

Pressing "I" to open the inventory brings up an inventory UI but you can't get rid of it without restarting and it doesn't really do anything as of now.
